data.title: Extract Anything
data.notes: Extract structured data from any file, using the amazing Kreuzberg library.

params.title: Extraction Configuration
params.caption: Customize the Kreuzberg settings for extractions.  See [Kreuzberg Configuration](https://docs.kreuzberg.dev/reference/configuration/#extractionconfig) for details.

params.title: Attach Files
params.caption: When enabled, all extracted text is attached to the job output as files.

params.title: Batch Mode
params.caption: When enabled, extractions are always placed into an `extractions` array, even if only one file is provided.

params.title: Debug Mode
params.caption: When enabled, additional debugging information will be printed to STDOUT, for troubleshooting purposes.
